Title: Memory Fragment 1
Text: On the first full moon of my knighthood, I was defeated by a band of Plushies. The big Plushie was more terrifying than I imaginedâ€”a slight hesitation almost cost me my life. I was lucky to survive. But Sentinel, I ask you to witness how I conquer my fear and become unyielding. Under your divine gaze, I will forge myself into the very embodiment of the Five Knightly Virtues!
